properties.areaDesc: Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley; Cadiz Basin
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 10 at 10:04AM PST until February 11 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph
expected.

* WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave. In
California, Cadiz Basin and San Bernardino County-Upper
Colorado River Valley.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree
limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST /NOON MST/ TUESDAY
